test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-date-less-than2args-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:07 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:date-less-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:date(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:date(lower bound) *******************************************************

test-case.name: cbcl-date-ge-001
test-case.description: Test that comparing large dates does not overflow.

modified.change: allow implementations to reject these dates

test-case.name: cbcl-date-lt-001
test-case.description: Test that comparing large dates does not overflow.

modified.change: allow implementations to reject these dates

test-case.name: cbcl-date-less-than-011
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:date, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $date }; exists(local:date(xs:date("1972-12-15"), fn:true()) lt xs:date("1972-12-15"))

test-case.name: cbcl-date-less-than-012
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:date, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $date }; local:date(xs:date("1972-12-15"), fn:false()) lt xs:date("1972-12-15")

test-case.name: cbcl-date-less-than-013
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:date, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $date }; exists(local:date(xs:date("1972-12-15"), fn:true()) ge xs:date("1972-12-15"))

test-case.name: cbcl-date-less-than-014
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:date, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $date }; local:date(xs:date("1972-12-15"), fn:false()) ge xs:date("1972-12-15")

test-case.name: cbcl-date-less-than-015
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:string, $timezone as xs:string) { xs:date( concat($date, $timezone) ) }; adjust-date-to-timezone(local:date("1972-12-14", "-12:00")) lt adjust-date-to-timezone(xs:date("1972-12-15+12:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-date-less-than-016
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:string, $timezone as xs:string) { xs:date( concat($date, $timezone) ) }; adjust-date-to-timezone(local:date("1972-12-14", "-12:00")) le adjust-date-to-timezone(xs:date("1972-12-15+12:00"))
